Articles.Content: Whenever I launch a craft, there is always infinite fuel. More specifically, the fuel never drains and I can simply burn engines forever. I did formerly have a couple of mods installed, including the "cheat window" one form Spacedoc. This had a bug where all the cheats were "On" to begin with.  I have since deleted all mods and uninstalled, and reinstalled the game, but still I have infinite fuel. I have also checked the in-game "infinite fuel" toggle and turning it "on" or "off" does not change anything.
